creditline: Gift of Jill Bonovitz and Nancy Hellebrand in honor of their mother, Janet Fleisher
description: primitive style; castle-like structure with bricks at top; archway at left trimmed in red with yellow windows with diagonal panes; three frowning figures at left, including figure with brown hair, lying down, wearing an orange garment, and heads and shoulders of two figures wearing purple; standing figure wearing purple tunic and orange hat and gloves, holding a paddle-like object, at left, with two additional figures in profile behind him; white, black and green borders
inscription: on back in black ink: 900 | on back in pencil: EA 51
provenance: Janet Fleisher Investment Corp., Philadelphia; given to MIA, 2016.
signed: on back in pencil: Eddie Arning
title: Family in House
